mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ASSIGNMENT ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSIGNMENT (admin_no, title, body, file, reg_date, mod_date) VALUES (#{admin_no}, #{title}, #{body}, #{file}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ASSIGNMENT SET is_activation = 1, start_date = NOW(), end_date = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE ASSIGNMENT SET is_activation = 0, start_date = null, end_date = null WHERE no = #{no}
